column4: Whats the point of a apt upgrade? Like isn't it a pretty simple utillity?

upgrade is a pretty essential command, checking the versions of your currently installed packages against the newest list downloaded through apt update. It then tries to upgrade as many as possible without breaking dependencies...
so its more of a speed upgrade?
oh, I see what you mean, the recent apt version release... well, it is a pretty powerful little tool, but I think the update was just a couple of minor changes, if I recall...
